contentrichtext.text: '''LFS''' can stand for: '''Organizations''': * [[London Film School]], a graduate film school in the United Kingdom. * [[Libertarian Futurist Society]], annually presents the Prometheus award for best libertarian Science Fiction. * [[Lutheran Family Services of Virginia]], a non-profit human services organization. * [[Lincoln Financial Sports]], a sports production company. * [[London Free School]], a couterculture/hippie collective that organised the first Notting Hill Carnival. * [[Lokhandwala Foundation School]], a private school in [[Mumbai]], [[India]], affiliated to the [[Council for the Indian School Certificate Examinations]] and offering education from junior kindergarten to the 12th grade. In '''computing''': * [[Live for Speed]], a computer racing simulator * [[Linux From Scratch]], a kit for building Linux distributions * [[Large File Summit]], an industry initiative to form large file support * [[Large File Support]], support for files larger than 2 GiB * [[Local file system]], the file system of the local machine * [[Live File System]], Microsoft's implementation of Universal Disk Format (UDF) 2.5 in Windows Vista * [[Log-structured File System (BSD)]], a log-structured file system for NetBSD * [[Logic File System]], a research file system that uses propositional logic for querying and navigating files '''Other''': * [[Local Fish Store]], an abbreviation in the reefkeeping world on the net * [[Lutetium Fine Scilicate]], a scintillation crystal material * [[Low Floor System]], a bus manufactured by Nova Bus used mainly for public transit * [[Labour Force Survey]], a household survey of employment statistics conducted in all European Union countries as well as Canada, Australia and New Zealand * [[Li-Fraumeni syndrome]] * Laminar [[Flame speed]] {{disambig}}
